RelatedSentence: MADURAI : The fact finding team of People 's Union for Human Rights ( PUHR ) which investigated the armed attack by caste Hindu groups on Dalits at Melamangalam village in Theni on April 6 , demanded action against 20 caste Hindus under the SC / ST ( Prevention of Atrocities ) Act 1989 and legitimate compensation to Dalits , who fled the village fearing further attacks .
